sentences.en: The move was widely seen as an attempt to appease critics of the regime.
sentences.cn: 普遍认为，这一举措是试图安抚批评政权的人。

sentences.en: Gandhi was accused by some of trying to appease both factions of the electorate.
sentences.cn: 甘地被一些人指责试图对两派选民都加以姑息。

sentences.en: Or is it simply a move to appease its critics?
sentences.cn: 或者说此举只是为了平息对它的批评？
